hero.title: AVA UNI - Your Essential Trusted Partner for Business Success
hero.content: We strive to be the driving force behind your business success. Whether it's system integration or digital solutions, we provide the right support to help you achieve your goals.

services_item.title: System & App Development
services_item.content: Providing comprehensive digital product planning from concept to delivery, ensuring high quality and performance.

services_item.title: System Analysis & Integration
services_item.content: Conducting in-depth system analysis to identify and resolve potential issues, offering integration solutions to enhance business operations efficiency.

services_item.title: UX/UI Design & Strategy
services_item.content: Focusing on user experience and interface design, formulating effective digital development strategies.

about_item.title: Experts in System Integration
content: AVA UNI 致力於提供最新的數位解決方案。以創新和客戶滿意為目標，幫助企業實踐數位理想。
AVA UNI 擁有多年系統開發經驗，我們的團隊擅長打造卓越的數位產品，無論是企業系統、電子商務平台與行動應用，我們一手包辦。信賴我們的客戶遍佈香港、台灣與新加坡等亞洲各地。

about_item.title: Continuously Innovating to Meet the Unique Needs of Diverse Businesses
content: AVA UNI 長年為客戶提出各項解決方案，不僅依照客戶的需求提供服務，更會針對顧客背景進行開發調查與分析，提出量身打造的產品開發企劃。
我們期待藉由極具專業的服務，推動並提升企業及其客戶的用戶體驗，持續創造豐富實績。
